Class HDBOfficerServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
services.HDBOfficerServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
IHDBOfficerService
public class HDBOfficerServiceImpl extends Object implements IHDBOfficerService
Implementation of the IHDBOfficerService interface. Handles business logic related to HDB Officers, primarily registration and retrieving applications for booking.

  • Method Details

    • registerForProject

      public HDBOfficerRegistration registerForProject(String officerNric, int projectId)
      Creates a registration request for an HDB Officer for a specific project, after eligibility checks.
      Specified by:
      registerForProject in interface IHDBOfficerService
      Parameters:
      officerNric - NRIC of the officer applying.
      projectId - ID of the project to register for.
      Returns:
      The created HDBOfficerRegistration object (status PENDING), or null if ineligible or errors occur.

    • getOfficerRegistrations

      public List<HDBOfficerRegistration> getOfficerRegistrations(String officerNric)
      Retrieves all registration requests (regardless of status) made by a specific officer.
      Specified by:
      getOfficerRegistrations in interface IHDBOfficerService
      Parameters:
      officerNric - NRIC of the officer.
      Returns:
      List of HDBOfficerRegistration objects, sorted newest first. Returns empty list if officer not found.

    • getPendingRegistrationsForProject

      public List<HDBOfficerRegistration> getPendingRegistrationsForProject(int projectId)
      Retrieves pending registration requests for a specific project (typically for Manager view).
      Specified by:
      getPendingRegistrationsForProject in interface IHDBOfficerService
      Parameters:
      projectId - ID of the project.
      Returns:
      List of pending HDBOfficerRegistration objects, sorted oldest first. Returns empty list if project not found.

    • checkOfficerEligibilityForRegistration

      public boolean checkOfficerEligibilityForRegistration(String officerNric, int projectId)
      Performs comprehensive eligibility checks for an officer registering for a project.
      Specified by:
      checkOfficerEligibilityForRegistration in interface IHDBOfficerService
      Parameters:
      officerNric - Officer's NRIC.
      projectId - Project ID.
      Returns:
      true if eligible according to all rules, false otherwise (prints specific error messages).

    • retrieveApplicationForBooking

      public BTOApplication retrieveApplicationForBooking(String applicantNric)
      Retrieves a SUCCESSFUL BTO application for a given applicant NRIC.
      Specified by:
      retrieveApplicationForBooking in interface IHDBOfficerService
      Parameters:
      applicantNric - NRIC of the applicant.
      Returns:
      The BTOApplication object if found and successful, null otherwise.
